title: PESSAT round 2 counseling
content: When is it going to take place? And suppose I want to shift from cse ec campus to aiml in rr, would I start from the beginning again and be in the kcet batch or continue with others who shifted their campus(assuming there are a good number of them)?

comments.body: Start from the beginning along with kcet batch
You're a fresher too, how do you know?
Why to leave core cse for something new?
I'm not, I just gave an example. I'm going to take cse rr itself.

Even I asked someone they told they can't say. We've already done 4 experiments in chem lab here, what's the point of starting from the beginning again

Edit: what you're saying will be true for those joining directly from round 2, not those who already started college, I asked a senior.
